item.description: <p>A primary benign tumour in the peritoneal area(the membrane lining the abdominal cavity!!<br/><br/><br/><br/>I can also put you in touch with medico-legal experts!!<br/><br/><br/><br/>Impressive, or what?<img src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GKM/$FILE/kiss.gif"</a>> </p>
